summary: Trading journal web app with streamlined checklist (Bias, OBS, LQS, FVG)

existing_features.title: Update the pre-trade checklist in the AddTradeDialog component to display exactly four checkbox items with labels: 'Bias - Market direction', 'OBS - Order blocks', 'LQS - Liquidity sweeps', and 'FVG - Fair value gaps'

Update the pre-trade checklist in the EditTradeDialog component to display exactly four checkbox items with labels: 'Bias - Market direction', 'OBS - Order blocks', 'LQS - Liquidity sweeps', and 'FVG - Fair value gaps'
Update the TradesList component to display the four checklist items (Bias, OBS, LQS, FVG) with their descriptive labels when showing trade details

new_feature_requests.summary: Update checklist to show only: Bias (Market direction), OBS (Order blocks), LQS (Liquidity sweeps), FVG (Fair value gaps) with checkbox format

projectName: Update checklist with labeled checkboxes for Bias, OBS, LQS, and FVG
